function_description: Set or edit due date for a card
initial_state: User is viewing a card in the card view with the due date section visible.
steps: Click on the `+` icon to add or the `pencil` icon to edit the due date.
Select the desired date from the calendar or input it in the text field.
Click the `Save` button to update the due date.
expected_state: The selected due date is displayed in the due date section, with appropriate color coding based on proximity or overdue status.
